summary: A standalone and simple Follower (with a little Group Healing Ability) Mod
descriptionHtml:
This follower is standalone and based on my imperial preset - Lune.

[b]Location: [/b]

Found in the Moorside Inn of Morthal (console command "coc morthalexterior01" to teleport to the place)


[b]Combat:[/b]

- loves one handed Weapons, knows the Ice Spike Spell, a Self Healing Spell and can heal the group a bit
- won't use staves
- comes with no armor and weapon (just fine clothes so he isn't naked)
- Lightfoot perk, some more basic perks, if it's too OP,  please let me know!
- levels with you
- essential, unique


[b]Misc.:[/b]

- can be married
- can be a steward (he should meet the requirements because of voicetype and being a follower, I can be wrong)
- voice is MaleEvenToned


[b]Armors I used for the screenshots: [/b]

Dwemer Gladiator Armor (RefurbMadness) + Armor Part from Light Elven Armor (RefurbMadness)
Regal Huntsman Armor (DreamBurrow) 



I wish you good hunting with him!



[b]Credits [/b]

author: Thrwomp
